mapper.insert:
SELECT product_seq.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO product (productId, codeBId, name, price, isActive, createdAt, profileImage, note) VALUES(#{productId}, #{codeBId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{isActive}, #{createdAt}, #{profileImage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT pr.codeBId, cb.name AS codeBName, pr.createdAt, pr.isActive, pr.name, pr.updatedAt, pr.profileImage, pr.note, pr.price FROM product pr LEFT JOIN codeB cb ON pr.codeBId = cb.codeBId WHERE productId=#{productId}
